title: Vietnamese edtechs attract international investor interest
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Innovative educational technology companies (edtechs) in Vietnam are increasingly on the radar of international private equity firms as education gets more digitised not only in the country itself, but in the entire Southeast Asian region, partly as a result of
